description: This is a C++ source file implementing the Badger plugin class within the WPEFramework, handling various device and system information requests, permissions, and application control functionalities.

classes.name: Badger
classes.description: Main plugin class implementing device and system info handling, permissions, and app control.

methods.name: const string Initialize(PluginHost::IShell * service)
methods.description: Initializes the plugin, obtains references to required interfaces and sets up internal state.

methods.name: void Deinitialize(PluginHost::IShell * service)
methods.description: Cleans up resources, releases interfaces, and resets state.

methods.name: string Information() const
methods.description: Returns static information string about the plugin.

methods.name: uint32_t ValidateCachedPermission(const std::string & appId,const std::string & requiredPermission)
methods.description: Checks if a given app has the required permission.

methods.name: uint32_t GetHDCPStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & hdcpJson)
methods.description: Fetches HDCP status JSON data for a given app.

methods.name: uint32_t GetHDRStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & hdrJson)
methods.description: Fetches HDR status JSON data for a given app.

methods.name: uint32_t GetAudioModeStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & audioModeStatus)
methods.description: Retrieves current audio mode status JSON for a given app.

methods.name: uint32_t GetWebBrowserStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & webBrowserStatusJson)
methods.description: Obtains web browser status JSON data for a given app.

methods.name: uint32_t GetWiFiStatus(const std::string & appId,std::string & isWifiDeviceStatus)
methods.description: Returns Wi-Fi status for a given app.

methods.name: uint32_t GetNativeDimensions(const std::string & appId,std::string & nativeDimensionsJson)
methods.description: Retrieves the device's native resolution dimensions.

methods.name: uint32_t GetDeviceType(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceTypeJson)
methods.description: Gets device type info from system configuration.

methods.name: uint32_t GetDeviceModel(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceModelJson)
methods.description: Gets device model info from system configuration.

methods.name: uint32_t DeviceInfo(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceInfoJson)
methods.description: Aggregates various device info including permissions, HDCP, HDR, browser, WiFi, dimensions, system info, etc.

methods.name: uint32_t DeviceCapabilities(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceCapabilitiesJson)
methods.description: Collects device capabilities including HDCP, HDR, audio, web browser, WiFi, dimensions, device type, and model.

methods.name: uint32_t Shutdown(const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Requests application shutdown via launch delegate.

methods.name: uint32_t GetDeviceId(const std::string & appId,std::string & deviceIdJson)
methods.description: Retrieves device ID from auth service.

methods.name: uint32_t DismissLoadingScreen(const std::string & appId)
methods.description: Signals app to dismiss the loading screen.

methods.name: uint32_t GetLocalizationPostalCode(const std::string & appId,std::string & postalCodeJson)
methods.description: Retrieves postal code based on country configuration.

methods.name: uint32_t ShowToaster(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Displays a toaster notification via launch delegate.

methods.name: uint32_t MediaEventAccountLink(const std::string & appId,std::string & result)
methods.description: Returns media event account link status.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleMetricsProcessing(const std::string & appId,const Core::JSON::VariantContainer & params)
methods.description: Processes metrics data received from JSON parameters.

methods.name: Core::hresult HandleAppGatewayRequest(const Exchange::Context & context,const std::string & method,const std::string & payload,std::string & result)
methods.description: Main handler dispatching incoming JSON RPC requests based on method name.

methods.name: std::string __anon12b35ee20202(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer& obj, const char* key)
bool __anon12b35ee20302(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer& obj, const char* key, bool defVal)
